title: The Lost Scroll
description: An important scroll containing village secrets has been stolen. You must track down the thief and recover the scroll before its contents are exposed.

challenges.title: Track the Thief
challenges.description: Use your tracking skills to find where the thief has gone. Look for footprints, broken branches, or other signs of passage.
challenges.success_message: You spot a trail of disturbed underbrush and occasional footprints leading deeper into the forest.
challenges.failure_message: You struggle to find any clear signs of the thief's passage.
challenges.critical_success_message: Your expert tracking reveals not only the thief's trail but also tells you they are carrying a heavy object and moving with a slight limp.

challenges.title: Navigate the Trapped Path
challenges.description: The thief has laid traps along their escape route. You must carefully navigate past them.
challenges.success_message: You carefully make your way through the trapped area, avoiding tripwires and pitfalls.
challenges.failure_message: You trigger one of the traps, taking damage but managing to continue.
challenges.critical_failure_message: You trigger a cascading series of traps that leaves you bruised and disoriented.

challenges.title: Ambush by Bandits
challenges.description: A group of bandits allied with the thief ambushes you on the path.
challenges.success_message: You defeat the bandit and continue on your way, more cautious than before.
challenges.failure_message: The bandit overwhelms you, but you manage to escape, though injured.

challenges.title: Cross the Raging River
challenges.description: A fast-flowing river blocks your path. You must find a way across.
challenges.success_message: Using your ninja skills, you successfully cross the river using a fallen log as a bridge.
challenges.failure_message: You slip while crossing and are swept downstream, eventually making it to shore but losing time.

challenges.title: Confront the Thief
challenges.description: You've tracked the thief to their hideout. Now you must defeat them and recover the scroll.
challenges.success_message: After a difficult battle, you defeat the thief and recover the stolen scroll.
challenges.failure_message: The thief proves too powerful, but as they're about to escape, backup arrives from the village, capturing them and recovering the scroll.
